All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    ArgumentHandler
    Argument handler handles the arguments that are passed to the ImageConverter program.
    BaseN
    Handles BaseN (and especially Base32 Hex) encoding.
    ByteHandler
    Byte Handler can be used to convert between byte arrays and other primitive data types.
    Checksum
    ProPra Image checksum.
    Compression
    Compression that is used in an image header.
    IllegalArgumentException
    Exception thrown, when arguments passed to the ImageConverter program are not valid.
    ImageConverter
    ImageConverter is a Program, that can be used to convert images between TGA and ProPra format.
    ImageHeader
    Abstract class for image headers.
    ImageReader
    Abstract wrapper-class for Image readers.
    ImageWriter
    Class to write an image to a specified output file.
    InvalidEncodingException
    Exception thrown, when there is an error with the Base-N encoding or decoding.
    InvalidImageException
    Exception thrown, when image, loaded from file is invalid.
    Node
    A Node in a huffman tree.
    Packet
    A packet, used for RLE Compression.
    Pixel
    Represents a pixel.
    PixelOrder
    Order of the colors in a pixel.
    ProPraImageHeader
    Image header in ProPra Format.
    ProPraReader
    Class to read a ProPra image from specified input file.
    ProPraWriter
    Class to write a ProPra Images to a specified output file.
    RawPacket
    A Raw packet used in RLE Compression.
    RunLengthPacket
    Run lenght packet used in RLW compression.
    TGAImageHeader
    Image header in TGA Format
    TGAReader
    Class to read a TGA image from specified image file.
    WorkMode
    Work mode for the current run of the Image Converter.
